#ПРОБНАЯ ВЕРСИЯ КАРТЫ
```{r message=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(leaflet)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, message = FALSE, eval = TRUE )
``` 
```{r message=FALSE, include=TRUE, fig.asp = 0.9, fig.width = 10, out.width = '100%'}
map <- read.csv2("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Dekromatia/Maps/main/map.csv", stringsAsFactors = FALSE,
                 encoding = "UTF-8")

pal <- colorFactor(c("red", "navy"), domain = c("production", "find"))

map%>%
leaflet() %>%
  addProviderTiles("Stamen.Watercolor")%>%
  addCircleMarkers(lng = ~latitude,
                   lat = ~longitude,
                   label = ~location,
                   radius = ~ifelse(place_of == "production", 9, 12),
                   color = ~pal(place_of),
                   stroke = FALSE, fillOpacity = 0.9) %>% 
    addLegend(pal = pal,
            values = ~place_of,
            title = "amphorae")
```
